doc.title: 20 Cars That Changed the World
doc.plot: A good over-view of cars that changed the world ..in one way or another.! From the million selling 'people' cars ..such as the VW Beetle, Mini, Morris Minor ..and even Trabant.! ...to the super-cars ...AC Cobra, E-type Jag, Dino 246 GT ..and Porsche 911. Presented by Tiff Needell ..with his great knowledge of cars.
